casebody.data:
No. 09-150. Michigan, Petitioner v. Richard Perry Bryant. 561 U.S. 1049, 131 S. Ct. 45,

177 L. Ed. 2d 1134,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 5653. August 16, 2010.

Motion of the Acting Solicitor General for leave to participate in oral argument as amicus curiae and for divided argument granted. Motion of Richard D. Friedman for leave to participate in oral argument as amicus curiae and for divided argument denied.

Justice Kagan took no part in the consideration or decision of this motion.
